body_html: @ygfeng MPI is already supported in c10d, but DDP has limited testing/support. Why do you need to use MPI for GPU-based DDP btw? If you are using GPU with one process per GPU, you should just use NCCL, which is significantly faster than CUDA-aware MPI.
